---
title: "Installation"
format: html
---

To install **ProtVis** from GitHub, run the following command in your R environment:

``` r
devtools::install_github("xuebinzhang-lab/ProtVis")
```

# Launch the Application

After successful installation, you can launch ProtVis using one of the following methods:

## Method 1: Load the package and run

``` r
library(ProtVis)
run_ProtVis()
```

## Method 2: Directly call the function

``` r
ProtVis::run_ProtVis()
```

This will open the interactive GUI for proteomics and PTM analysis.
